name: Lily's Night Off
description: Lily's Night Off is a visual novel, but not in the typical sense; as you progress in this game, your actions drastically change character personalities, story lines, and lead to unexpected outcomes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 Vista or newer Processor: Intel速 Pentium速 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
